data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Before death takes away what you are given, give away what there is to give.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: What you seek is seeking you.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Gamble everything for love, if you are a true human being. Halfheartedness does not reach into majesty.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Come, seek, for search is the foundation of fortune: every success depends upon focusing the heart.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Gamble everything for love, if you are a true human being. Halfheartedness does not reach into majesty.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Lovers don’t finally meet somewhere. They’re in each other all along.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Why are you so enchanted by this world, when a mine of gold lies within you?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: There is a voice that doesn’t use words. Listen.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will you be polished?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
